column5: Seems they're looking for new cops in New Zealand. Best commercial I've seen in a long time!!!
They had that video on CHCH morning news this AM
Very outside the box. Â I thought it was great!

In 1976 the boys and I drove my bright orange 1969 Ford Econoiline van to Florida. We are sitting on the beach reading the Miami Harald and Bruce says "they are hiring Cops here". A few hours latter they are measuring us for uniforms. $10,000.00 a year not including OT and green card included, no questions asked. High School grads preferred!!!! I was making 20K as a shipping clerk in the Steel Plant.
